FuncDef: The display traffic-segment configured-information command displays the configuration of an EPG. The display traffic-segment configured-information command displays the configuration of an EPG. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
